title: Qui valide ?
content:

"; } ?>[/ccc][br][ref]*[/ref][reftxt]I am the reference![/reftxt][t][r][c4]this table[/c][c4]has four[/c][c4]cells[/c][c4]on one row[/c][/r][/t][box]boxes[/box][bbox]big boxes[/bbox][list][*]well[*]I'm a list[*]with 3 items[/list][img]https://corz.org/img/no_image.png[/img] [br][left]for left-floating[/left] [br][right]for right floating[/right][br][url="https://corz.org/" title="it's tech!"]hmm.. looks like the server's down[/url] [eurl="http://somesite.com"]for an external link [/url] [br][turl="for information"]a simple "link-less" pop-up title[/url] [br][email=email@address.com?subject=w00h00!]hit me![/email] [br][hr]horizontal rule, 70% wide, centred [br][hr2]horizontal rule, 50px wide, aligned left [br][hr3]horizontal rule, 100px wide, aligned left [hr4]horizontal rule, 150px wide, aligned left [br][block]a quote block (centred, slightly narrower than regular paragraph)[/block] [mid]I'm in the middle! (centred, "CENTERED" if you're at the left of the Atlantic)[/mid][dc1]i[/dc]drop-cap, from a [dc2]p[/dc]thin size all [dc3]L[/dc]the way up to [dc4]X[/dc]a ... [dc5]W[/dc]thick size[size=24]I AM BIG![/size][sp]a space, for when you need real space (creates an  ) [br][color=red]using standard web color values, or..[/color] [color=#9C64CA]a proper hex color value, the best of both worlds.[/color][legend]legendary functionality![/legend][dl] [dt]erm, dunno what goes here, probably a title[/dt] [dd]this is a definition table, whatever the hell that is[/dd] [dd]I guess it works like this. hmm. might be useful[/dd] [/dl]There I was, going along at my own size and height until [sup]Bang![/sup] woah, what was that?
